Free Support

You will get 90 Days free support incase any bugs or issue (Except data recovery).

At Devnix Solutions we offer end to end solution for Odoo services. Which includes analysis & consultation on the workflows and integration part. Please note that You're not allowed to distribute this module after purchase! Incase of any question regarding this module feel free to email us on info@devnix.solutions or raise a ticket on support.
